---
title: "Linear models"
---

### Learning objectives

* perform exploratory data analysis on a dataset for the purpose of regression modelling
* interpret the coefficients of a linear model (binary, continuous and categorical variables);
* fit the model by least squares (using dedicated software), correctly accounting for categorical variables;

### Content


- Course notes: chapter [4 (Linear regression models)](https://lbelzile.github.io/math60604a/linearmodels.html), Sections 4.1--4.4.
